name: number-guesser
description: This is a simple app which lets user to guess the number in 3 guesses  Skeleton framework used for styling on this application ==================================================================================== Game Descritpion :- this game app will allow the user to guess a number between 2 numbers if the guess is correct you will see it on the screen with green message  if you are not able to guess it with 3 attetmps you will be alowed to play again. ====================================================================================
